Package Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
Controller.Controller
public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
Controller Class that handles the View Elements (example: Buttons) of most windows
Author:
Busted

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void btnBotOkClicked()
    Method that handles btnBotOk button that button belongs to the Botanzahl window checks if spieleranzahl+botanzahl doesn't exceed 5 (5 is max players) puts the value of the slider of the window to the Hashmap in Data class similar to the method btnPlayerOkClicked, but for the botnumber
    void btnLeaderboardClicked()
    Method that calls method to open leaderboard gets called from click on btnLeaderboard button
    void btnPlayerOkClicked()
    Method that handles btnPlayerOk button that button belongs to the Spieleranzahl window checks if spieleranzahl+botanzahl doesn't exceed 5 (5 is max players) puts the value of the slider of the window to the Hashmap in Data class similar to the method btnBotOkClicked, but for the playernumber
    void btnRulesOkClicked()
    Method that handles btnRulesOk, button on Rule window closes the Rule window
    void buttonClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent evt)
    Method buttonClicked handles all buttons that can be clicked in the MainMenu window calls Methods that handle the buttonevent
    void initialize()
    Method initialize gets called when Controller is initialized puts values into Hashmap, which is placed in Data Class, where basic things are saved starts the music with a call to the Music class
    void loginWindowBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent evt)
    Method that handles the loginWindow, this window opens when start game button is clicked handles registering, login in and playing as guest buttons checks or writes new users to a encrypted csv file if login/register failes it shows on the corresponding buttons
    void szeneButtonClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent evt)
    Method that handles the Buttons in the Theme window changes the theme (music and background) saves theme selection to the hashmap in Data class

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws java.net.MalformedURLException
      Method initialize gets called when Controller is initialized puts values into Hashmap, which is placed in Data Class, where basic things are saved starts the music with a call to the Music class
      Throws:
      java.net.MalformedURLException

    • buttonClicked

      public void buttonClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent evt) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method buttonClicked handles all buttons that can be clicked in the MainMenu window calls Methods that handle the buttonevent
      Parameters:
      evt - , evt is the button that is clicked
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.Exception

    • btnPlayerOkClicked

      public void btnPlayerOkClicked()
      Method that handles btnPlayerOk button that button belongs to the Spieleranzahl window checks if spieleranzahl+botanzahl doesn't exceed 5 (5 is max players) puts the value of the slider of the window to the Hashmap in Data class similar to the method btnBotOkClicked, but for the playernumber

    • btnBotOkClicked

      public void btnBotOkClicked()
      Method that handles btnBotOk button that button belongs to the Botanzahl window checks if spieleranzahl+botanzahl doesn't exceed 5 (5 is max players) puts the value of the slider of the window to the Hashmap in Data class similar to the method btnPlayerOkClicked, but for the botnumber

    • szeneButtonClicked

      public void szeneButtonClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent evt)
      Method that handles the Buttons in the Theme window changes the theme (music and background) saves theme selection to the hashmap in Data class
      Parameters:
      evt - , evt is the Button that is clicked

    • btnRulesOkClicked

      public void btnRulesOkClicked()
      Method that handles btnRulesOk, button on Rule window closes the Rule window

    • loginWindowBtnClicked

      public void loginWindowBtnClicked​(javafx.event.ActionEvent evt) throws java.lang.Exception
      Method that handles the loginWindow, this window opens when start game button is clicked handles registering, login in and playing as guest buttons checks or writes new users to a encrypted csv file if login/register failes it shows on the corresponding buttons
      Parameters:
      evt -
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      java.lang.Exception

    • btnLeaderboardClicked

      public void btnLeaderboardClicked() throws java.io.IOException
      Method that calls method to open leaderboard gets called from click on btnLeaderboard button
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
